album.title: Peace In A Time Of War

track.name: Peace in a Time of War
comments: One of the greatest reggae tunes ever created

YO POSITIVE PEOPLE!! If you like SJA and Concious Reggae/Dancehall please check out my music. I am out of Cincinnati Ohio, concious lyrics and a message that must be heard. My last fm page is: http://www.last.fm/music/Elementree My myspace page is: http://www.myspace.com/elementree1. Jah Bless and his message forever spread!!
